<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Astronomer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=949)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Different cultures have created stories of the hows and whys of the universe, if things exist beyond the stars, and if the gods manipulate the heavenly bodies. But astronomers aren't interested in folktales—they desire truth.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Scholar_Astronomer.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Astronomer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=949)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 241</row>

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +8, [Astronomy Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +12, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Living Sextant** If the astronomer is able to see the night sky, they can [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) using a +10 modifier.

**Items**
astrolabe, [spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53), [Material Component Pouch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=33), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 23

**Counterspell** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature Casts a Spell the astronomer has prepared; **Effect** The astronomer expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. The astronomer loses its spell slot as if it had cast the triggering spell. The astronomer then attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +6 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 17, attack +9
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Floating Disk](/Spells.aspx?ID=124), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), [Unseen Servant](/Spells.aspx?ID=352) (4 slots)

</column>

name: Astronomer
